title: If there is no data for series, it should display a friendly error message to remind the user.
OB: When previewing the series, there is no friendly error message displayed if there is no data available.
EB: When previewing the series, a friendly error message should be displayed if there is no data available.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the series preview. 
2. Remove or have no data available for the series. 
3. Check if a friendly error message is displayed to alert the user about the lack of data.
